name: NightLight
0: ”Alexa, open Night Light for time 20 seconds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: night light
des: Night light can light up Alexa at night so you don't step on the dog when going to the bathroom. Just say night light on for 10 seconds.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
